name: ids-enterprise-wc
description: The Web Component version of the IDS Enterprise component library
author: Infor Design

scripts.build:dist: npx rimraf build/dist/development && npx tsc && node scripts/esbuild-prod.mjs
scripts.build:dist:prod: npx rimraf build/dist/production && npx tsc && node scripts/esbuild-prod.mjs --mode production
scripts.build:coverage: npx rimraf build/dist/development && node --max-old-space-size=8192 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --config ./webpack.config.dev.js --env coverage
scripts.build:stats: npx rimraf build/dist/production && npx webpack --config ./webpack.config.dist.js --mode production
scripts.copy-static:dev: cp -f package-dist.json build/dist/development/package.json && cp -f README.md build/dist/development && cp -f LICENSE build/dist/development
scripts.copy-static:prod: cp -f package-dist.json build/dist/production/package.json && cp -f README.md build/dist/production && cp -f LICENSE build/dist/production
scripts.start: npx rimraf build/development && node --max-old-space-size=8192 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack serve --live-reload --open --config ./webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.lint: npx eslint src test && npx stylelint src/**/**/*.scss --config .stylelintrc.json && npm run mdlint && npx htmlhint 'src/**/*.html' && npx tsc
scripts.publish:dry-run: npm run build:dist:prod && npm run copy-static:prod && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.publish:npm: npm run build:dist:prod && npm run copy-static:prod && cd build/dist/production && npm publish
scripts.publish:debug: npm run build:dist && npm run copy-static:dev && cd build/dist/development && npm publish
scripts.publish:link: npm run build:dist && npm run copy-static:dev && cd build/dist/development && npm link
scripts.test:open: npm run test:start-server & npx cypress open
scripts.test:build: npx webpack --config ./webpack.config.dev.js --env no-csp --no-watch && npx nyc instrument --in-place=true --compact=false build/development
scripts.test: npm run test:start-server & npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/ids-tag/* --browser chrome --headless
